unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Needed more than ever with these crazy weather patterns! My uncle in Kerala, Krishnan, almost lost his whole paddy crop last Onam due to floods. He got some insurance payout but it barely covered half his losses. Maybe Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana needs a review, no? We need better awareness, especially in rural areas near places like Raichur. Eating only biryani becomes tough when crops fail, ya know! Farmers need help.
